name: Man with Lights
description:
Ahearn (@Gstarbase)
Oil pastel, transferred to digital
JPG 3802x4349 @ 192dpi
1/1
1996

I've done several versions of this image in differnt media, and this was the last iteration.  The first was a single sheet of black construction paper, cut with an exacto knife.  No drawing, just cutting.  THe cutout became a screen print.  Then, in 1996, I revisted the image with oil pastels.  I consider this piece to be the best of the lot.


I hope you enjoy it.

~Ahearn
